title: Spinach and mango salad
ingredients: ['100g (4 oz) flaked almonds', '4 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 dessertspoon mustard powder', 'small handful chopped fresh tarragon', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 bag fresh spinach, torn', '2 mangos - peeled, stones removed and diced']
